name: Hololive Isekai
description:
The idols of Hololive have been mysteriously sucked into an alternate dimension, where dangerous monsters roam. It feels too much like a game, but no time to think about that! They have to save each other, battle monsters and escape back to Hololive HQ, so they can return to putting smiles on their fans' faces! Game Info

This a fan game that's heavily inspired by Darkest Dungeon, Pokemon, and a many other JRPGs. This is a fan-game created for Hololive members and fans.

This game features the quirky characters of Hololive, an intricate combat system, a character collection system, and some fun "what-if" scenarios.

Current version: 0.1 (pre-alpha demo)

The current version of the game is a short concept demo, featuring the combat. Many of the elements and assets are subject to change. This is a non-profit fan-made project; game is built completely out of our free time and is free to play.
